description: TCGA barcode identifier for the study participant, eg TCGA-02-0001
progression-free interval time in days, whose values are the same as PFI_time in Tab TCGA-CDR.

Progression-free interval event, 1 for patient having new tumor event whether it was a progression of disease, local recurrence, distant metastasis, new primary tumor of the cancer, or died with the cancer without new tumor event, including cases with a new tumor event whose type is N/A. 0 for censored otherwise. New primary tumor in other organ was censored.
progression-free interval time in days, whose values are the same as PFI_time_2

Progression-free interval event, 1 for patient having new tumor event whether it was a progression of disease, local recurrence, distant metastasis, new primary tumor of the cancer, or died with the cancer without new tumor event, including cases with a new tumor event whose type is N/A. 0 for censored otherwise.
Disease-free interval with competing risk events, 0 for censored, 1 for DFI event of interest, 2 for competing risk death.
Progression-free interval with competing risk events, 0 for censored, 1 for PFI event of interest, 2 for competing risk death.
progression-free interval (PFI_1) with competing risk events, 0 for censored, 1 for PFI_1 event of interest, 2 for competing risk death.

Progression-free interval time in days, for events, either new_tumor_event_dx_days_to or death_days_to,  whichever is applicable; or for censored cases, either last_contact_days_to or death_days_to, whichever is applicable. 0 for censored otherwise.
progression-free interval time in days, whose values are the same as PFI_time_1
Data row number from the original file

Progression-free interval event, 1 for patient having new tumor event whether it was a progression of disease, local recurrence, distant metastasis, new primary tumor of the cancer, or died with the cancer without new tumor event, including cases with a new tumor event whose type is N/A. 0 for censored otherwise.

Progression-free interval time in days, for events, either new_tumor_event_dx_days_to or death_days_to,  whichever is applicable; or for censored cases, either last_contact_days_to or death_days_to, whichever is applicable. 0 for censored otherwise.
TCGA study abbreviation, eg LAML. Full list available at https://gdc.cancer.gov/resources-tcga-users/tcga-code-tables/tcga-study-abbreviations
Disease-specific survival time in days, whose values are the same as DSS_time in isb-project-zero:pancancer_atlas.TCGA_CDR.
Disease-specific survival time in days, whose values are the same as DSS_time in isb-project-zero:pancancer_atlas.TCGA_CDR.

Progression-free interval time in days, for events, either new_tumor_event_dx_days_to or death_days_to,  whichever is applicable; or for censored cases, either last_contact_days_to or death_days_to, whichever is applicable. 0 for censored otherwise. New primary tumor in other organ was censored.
progression-free interval (PFI_1) with competing risk events, 0 for censored, 1 for PFI_2 event of interest, 2 for competing risk death.
Disease-specific survival with competing risk events, 0 for censored, 1 for DSS event of interest, 2 for competing risk death.
